Articles.Content:
It's just a small contract pack that adds a bank to the game. The bank gives you money and after 2 weeks it takes it back with some interest.

There are 3 contracts currently that will give you around 20000/100000/500000 credits.

To get bigger loans just upgrade your mission control and have some points in reputation.

When you accept a loan it will show itself as a contract to put a flag on the sun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Try to complete it i dare you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

MIRROR: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/ttvlz9bzw1ahawz/BANKING-V.01.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ttvlz9bzw1ahawz/BANKING-V.01.zip?dl=0)

<abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> soon.

LICENCE (since it's required ![k_tongue.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_tongue.gif) ): MIT

To install just copy the Banking folder into your KSP/GameData folder and make sure you have Contract Configurator installed.

This is a pretty clever way to add a basic banking system to KSP using the existing tools. While this isn't a super complicated mod, I have to give you props for making good use of the tools available to you.

Clever!

See also [Kerbanomics: Kerbal Payroll and Loans](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104000), which is more involved
